feed.title: Qasim Ali
feed.subtitle: Graduate student in Engineering at the University of Waterloo, studying world models and reinforcement learning. My industry background is in embedded systems and autonomous driving.

entry.content:
How well do you know large language models?

This short, interactive Google Slides quiz walks through 30 curated questions designed to test your intuition and knowledge of LLMs â€” from transformer internals to LLM data. The questions were created from reading ~10 core NLP papers.

These arenâ€™t just trivia â€” theyâ€™re meant to surface subtle points, common misconceptions, and important details how we build LLMs.

Whether youâ€™re just getting into LLMs or already working with them daily, youâ€™ll likely find a few surprises inside.

Sample Topics Covered

  • What data does the LLM see during pre-training?
  • What tokens are actually used by the LLM?
  • What do causal attention masks actually look like? Grab a coffee, try the quiz, and share it with a colleague to compare answers.
